00030 #include "elementdatabase.h"
00031 
00032 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00033 {
00034         // loading data from embedded ressource file system
00035         ElementDatabase db;
00036         db.addFromDirectory(":/data");
00037 
00038         // create, show and execute the main window
00039         QApplication app(argc, argv);
00040         MainWindow mw(app, db);
00041         mw.show();
00042         return app.exec();
00043 }
